name: Road to Yahanam
description: Game summary: Project “ Road to Yahanam” it's a Diablo-style RPG it is set in the Medieval era in Sweden and its about people living in a bubble for a couple of hundred of years. Not aware of what goes on in the outside world. Protected by a magical Barrier. They start to see that things acting weird, animals are disappearing and their peaceful life is changing for the worse. you “ the player “ start adventuring as a hunter in your little place you knew as home to figure out what's going on and solve the mystery.
